Free shuttle got us there in time though I wish she had stopped closer to our departnure gate. We had a long walk with ur luggage.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Start our Honeymoon”
Reviews.Author: Lisa_J_B
Reviews.Content: I'm pleased the reviews lived up to the reality. Great rooms, lovely peaceful setting and super to have free potato chips, malt balls, water and ice cream on hand! Rooms were clean, spacious and comfortable. Check in and general service was friendly. Had food at the bar in the evening and breakfast was good with plenty of variety. Used the complementary shuttle to the airport - nice personal service. No complaints and definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: MarkBklyn
Reviews.Content: A wonderful "green" hotel that is clean, quiet, comfortable, with great amenities. This is a nice alternative to the hotels along the airport strip. We stayed here overnight to catch a flight in the morning. It relaxed us and made our trip much better. The complimentary breakfast was fabulous (melon and prosciutto, among the choices). The restaurant is fantastic. Highly recommended. The chef came out to talk with us and we met nice people. What a great surprise. Check out the complimentary individual servings of Haagen Dazs ice cream in the freezer.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice and secure!!”
Reviews.Author: Ratbitw
Reviews.Content: Very Nice and secure!! Excellent service and a nice breakfast buffet.

Reviews.Title: “Glad we picked this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Stepnewe
Reviews.Content: This hotel offers great service with very spacious, clean rooms with great bathroom amenities. Free wi-fi is available along with a fully equiped business center if you do not have your own computer. The grounds are beautiful with streams and well manicured lawns. Hotel is located closed to the airport and rail station and offers a convenient shuttle service to/from both. What I liked least was that there were no dining or shopping options with-in walking distance. The hotel does have a nice restaurant and offers room service. We had room service and the food and service were good.

Reviews.Title: “Stunning”
Reviews.Author: iheartcedarbrook
Reviews.Content: We loved this. The room was perfect, I even took photos of the bathroom because its decor inspired me to copy in our basement remodel at home. Loved the bed, loved the ice cream and yogurt freebies. The hotel has a free airport shuttle and the driver was extremely friendly and helpful. The staff was efficient and kind. The grounds are spectacular: there's even a path through a thicket behind the hotel and veggie garden plots on the grounds. The hotel is also very green. The food served there is organic, the meat is grass-fed, no hormones. I could go on and on..... great experience!

Reviews.Title: “A Surefire 10”
Reviews.Author: johnpowell_99
Reviews.Content: Treat yourself to the finest accommodation available near the SEATAC airport. My wife and I were blown away by this oasis of comfort and elegance in the midst of the normal chaos of a big city airport. We rate everything about this Lodge a 10 and wholeheartedly recommend it to the weary traveler looking for an escape to nirvana from the typical, understaffed, unpleasant airport motel. Stay here. You'll be glad you did.

Reviews.Title: “best airport area hotel I've ever stayed at”
Reviews.Author: machynes
Reviews.Content: I've stayed around the SEATAC airport for years and never knew such a wonderful place was so close. With hotel transportation available to the new light rail system, it would even make for a great place to stay instead of downtown. Over looking densely wooded areas, big windows that open, made for peaceful evening wind down from a busy day!

Reviews.Title: “If you don't like this place, you can't be satisfied.”
Reviews.Author: John60742
Reviews.Content: From the outset, the staff made me feel like a VIP. The room was available early & I was surprised at the large size of the bathroom. Spotless room, bathroom, hallways & common areas. Immaculate grounds. Airport & pickup & light rail made renting a car unnecessary. I was looking for a place that wasn't run of the mill. Wanting to stay in a Northwest lodge-style place if it even existed. It does. Cedarbrook is the place!

Reviews.Title: “The Best”
Reviews.Author: roadabug
Reviews.Content: What a hidden gem. This place was fantastic in all aspects. Food was great as well. Amenities included in your rate are second to none. I may travel back to Seattle just to stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “An oasis in busy Seattle”
Reviews.Author: 2fritzie2
Reviews.Content: This is our newest "gem" of a place to stay while visiting Seattle. The grounds are beautiful and the contemporary decor of the lodge was both sleek and warm at the same time. The 24-hour complimentary snack bar, serving chocolate-covered raisins, pretzels, mint and chocolate-covered moth balls, oranges, apples, string cheese, chips, yogurt and water was amazing enough, but the freezer was filled with Häagen-Dazs ice cream! All at no charge. This same room included several easy chairs, sofas, a TV and small library. The outdoor eating area was beautiful with a pond and flowers everywhere. Our room was spotless with two sizes of pillows to choose from. The food was delicious. We enjoyed everything about this place.

Reviews.Title: “a hidden gem; literally”
Reviews.Author: akubelly
Reviews.Content: Located just a block off of industrial International Way and just minutes from the airport you'll find this oasis hidden among the trees, green, green, green. Beautifully manicured grounds with water features and outdoor seating make you feel like you're really at a lodge. What's more the rooms and common areas are beautiful; clean, modern, new. The guest rooms are bunched together into separate buildings, each with it's own "living room" where you'll find a self-serve kitchenette stocked with complimentary snacks and bottles of water. The guest rooms have high ceilings and large picture windows (lots of natural light), very comfortable beds, beautiful built-in furniture, and a clean modern bathrooms with a serious soaking depth tub. You need to stay in SeaTac you HAVE to check this place out.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay for my honeymoon!”
Reviews.Author: Rovylern
Reviews.Content: My new wife and I stayed a week here after our wedding. From the moment we landed and called for the free shuttle, we felt very taken care of. The grounds were amazing (18 acres - more than half of that protected wetlands), the lobby and main entry room were beautiful, and the staff both professional and extremely courteous. Our room was perfect, the bed was comfortable, and the bathroom was very generously appointed. This hotel has living room areas in each of the guest buildings with complementary water, string cheese, yogurt, ice cream, and a selection of very delicious malt balls. Their shuttle will take you, free of charge, to the SeaTac light rail station, airport, and a local mall with some excellent restaurants (be sure to try Joey's at the Southcenter Mall) and a Target right across the street from the mall in case you have forgotten anything you need. When you're ready to return to the hotel, a quick call gets you a reasonably quick pickup and ride back. While we were within walking distance to the airport, we rarely heard airplane noise even when outside and never while inside. We could not have chosen a better place to spend our honeymoon.

Reviews.Title: “Great location but the food is only "Fair"”
Reviews.Author: gaila15
Reviews.Content: This is a great location for small business meetings due to its proximity to the airport and easy access. However, I was there for a 3 day meeting with all meals inclusive. They served very similar food every day and in fact we had True Cod as one of the entree choices for 4 meals. The salads and desserts that they serve for lunch and dinner are exactly the same and no variation in the breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: paTraveler53449
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with the hotel. The staff was friendly. The environment was pretty and peaceful. The room has high ceiling and big window. Our kids loved the free ice cream at the end of the day.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, nice place”
Reviews.Author: ovimo
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice place close to Seattle Airport, good service, nice large clean rooms with utilitarian furniture, free high speed internet, quiet location. We stayed a night and had a great night sleep. Would return.

Reviews.Title: “European-styled modern and tranquil luxury near SeaTac airport.”
Reviews.Author: aknizek
Reviews.Content: This is my absolute #1 favorite place to stay for business while traveling near Seattle. A short, 3-minute drive from SeaTac airport, you would never guess this peacefulLodge would be nestled in the greenery and woods nearby. Rooms have clean, European styling, with a feather duvet and ample comfort in a chair to watch TV, ceiling-to-floor windows, plush robe in the closet, and a killer deep-set bath tub. Amenities include Jasmine bath crystals, 3 different soaps, shampoo, conditioner and lotion - all eco-friendly formulas in biodegradable bottles. A visit downstairs to the lobby of each Lodge will invite you to a room warmly furnished with plush chairs, a couch, fireplace and TV and.... a refrigerator stocked with complimentary Hagen Daz ice cream cups, yogurt, and cheese sticks. Rain Water water bottles are stocked in an adjacent cooler, and the counter offers jars of giant malt balls, chips, chocolate pretzels, and fruit.... all complimentary. The continental breakfast is amazing - hearty oatmeal with options for hazelnuts, walnuts, dried blueberries, cranberries, brown sugar... smoked salmon, capers, proscuitto, fresh fruit, bagels, cereal, croissants, and a full Starbucks coffee bar to help yourself to. The workout room is the best I have ever seen, with at least 4 treadmills, 4 ellipticals, 3 recumbent bikes, and a full set of weight machines and free weights to boot. This room overlooks the manicured, lush grounds outside where the view is serene and tranquil. There are also nice walkways around the grounds to walk or jog and enjoy the landscaping, pools, and scenery. Spa products and gifts are available at the front desk as well. The customer service is top notch, and I always leave feeling pampered, refreshed, and ready for what the day has to bring.

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel in Seattle and that's saying a lot”
Reviews.Author: melmo152
Reviews.Content: I was lucky enough to get to stay at the Cedarbrook twice, one night on each end of my 5 day vacation. Though this place is located at the south end of the Seattle area, if I had known how wonderful it was going to be, I would have booked my entire stay here. Seattle's light rail goes to the airport from downtown, so theorectically, I could have taken the train into the city to meet up with my friends. The Cedarbrook will shuttle you over to the rail station. Everything about this hotel was awesome. The rooms, though small are very efficiently laid out so it didn't feel cramped. The bathroom was large and gorgeous. There was an elaborate selection of coffee and tea in the room. The staff was warm & friendly and totally exuded that Seattle sincerity I've missed since moving away. The Continental breakfast was fantastic - home baked goods, fresh smoked salmon, etc. They have an unattended snack bar in each of the buildings that's available 24 hours. The phrase snack bar actually cheapens the reality - there is a fridge full of yogurt, cheese sticks, ice cream cups, and bottled water. On the counter there was fresh fruit, bags of local potato chips, and glass jars of candy. This was unlike anything I have experienced in an American hotel. The gym was really big and posh with incredible wilderness views. The grounds were beautiful. As is typical in Seattle, it was drizzling the entire time so I didn't get to totally enjoy the outdoor spaces. I would definitely stay at this hotel again and bring friends. It also looks like a perfect place to get married too. When I returned for my 2nd visit, the staff remembered me and made me feel like I was returning home.

Reviews.Title: “An oasis at the airport”
Reviews.Author: Jfisher4
Reviews.Content: We easily reserved a nights stay online. Since we'd be landing so late we knew we couldn't drive to our destination after flying cross country and arriving @ 3 a.m. We wanted a nice room and quiet location to adjust to the time zone. We arrived, called the shuttle and it arrived within 7 minutes. The hotel was within 2 miles of the airport and truely an oasis. Very clean, neat and professional. Treated us like they were taking care of royalty and got us to our room promptly and refused our tip for the help. They also have living-rooms/ reading-rooms with complimentary snacks so the ice cream @ 3a.m. went over well with the kids. Easily beats every hotel chain I've ever stayed at and the rates were very competative.

Reviews.Title: “Wow - I want to go back to Seattle just to stay here.”
Reviews.Author: AusJeff
Reviews.Content: I was already booked in to another hotel in Federal Way, but was looking for something closer to Seattle. After stumbling upon Cedarbrook Lodge (it did not previously show up in my searches) and seeing the reviews and photos, I just had to try this place for myself. Wow was I glad I changed 'hotels'. Well you can't really call this place a hotel, I'd call it more a retreat. The place is stunning, it's relaxing, it's class, it's got friendly down-to-earth helpful staff and the you would swear you're in some magical retreat in a hidden part of the world, yet only minutes away from SeaTac. You only hear the aeroplanes outside and even then they aren't that loud. While I normally try and go for more apartment style accommodation, the rooms were nice and cosy feeling. The bed was extremely comfortable and the deep bathtub a blessing. The living areas were great to be able to grab some water, yoghurt, ice-cream or nibbles 24x7. My only complaint here was lack of ice available to take back to the room to keep your water cold (which amazingly they did reply to upon submitting an online survey). The place should really be a 5 star resort in my view. It does have a health retreat kind of feel and peaceful, tranquil atmosphere and I would have loved to have had a spa and/or massage to top it off, sadly both are currently lacking. The shuttle service they provide is amazing. Not just to SeaTac and the Light Rail (a whole $5 return to downtown Seattle) but to the Southcenter Mall. We almost felt like we had a car waiting for us whenever we wanted to venture out. Upon returning from downtown 1 call from the station before and the cute Flex was already waiting for us. There really is no need to be downtown with their shuttle service and Seattle's light rail system (last stop is Westlake Center and the monorail is upstairs to take you to Seattle Center). If cruising, you could get a town car, or the light rail and a cab from downtown to the piers. The continental buffet breakfast was adequate, given I'm normally one that prefers a hot breakfast, in-room and the restaurant was a little steep for what you get, but no real complaints here. I have stayed at hundreds of places (normally 4-5 star) and I am a little fussy. This place is easily in my top 5. I would certainly stay here next time I'm in Seattle, In fact I want to go back to Seattle just to stay here :)

Reviews.Title: “Escape to hidden gem near Sea-Tac, with the ambience of a japanese garden”
Reviews.Author: messena
Reviews.Content: I only spent 12 hours at the hotel, as i was visiting the area for one quick meeting, but in those 12 hours the staff and the amenities made me a fan (literally, i became a "fan" on facebook the next morning). Great value, lovely rooms, good creative take on staples on the menu (real anchovies in the ceasar salad) and such a relaxing space. Free water bottles, ice cream, fruit, cereal, chips and candy in their open "living rooms" in each building. A class act all the way. I highly recommend it for business and leisure travelers. Panos

Reviews.Title: “EXCEPTIONAL”
Reviews.Author: ballicats
Reviews.Content: Just driving up to the lodge you know you've found a great place! The grounds are spectacular and it is so quiet there--even being close to the airport. Everywhere you look in the lodge, it is pleasing to the eye. The room was very comfortable and very pleasant--we didn't feel like we were in a hotel. We loved the "living areas". It would be a great place to have a group meet. Service was exceptional and very friendly. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Sanctuary in the woods!”
Reviews.Author: mommacelestee
Reviews.Content: After our Alaskan cruise we needed some down time before heading back home. Cedarbrook offered the remote, quiet sanctuary that we were looking for. They arranged for us to be picked up at our pier after our cruise and upon arriving we knew immediatly we had made the right choice! The grouds are very beautiful and the rooms are very comfortable. The word spacious best describes Cedarbrook, inside and out! After resting, we wanted to do some sightseeing. They shuttled us to and from the light rail station! The train takes about 30 min to the Space Needle and other waterfront attractions....very easy! If you want to get away from it all- to experience beautiful, natural, spacious surroundings - yet be able to connect with the heart beat of all that is Seattle, consider Cedarbrook!

Reviews.Title: “Unexpected Gem”
Reviews.Author: MrMovie500
Reviews.Content: Would never have guessed this place existed. It is hidden in a residential area near Seatac Aitport. We held our spring board meetings here. the accomodations were great. This place used to be a training center for Washington Mutual and so it has a very interesting layout. Different buildings with individul rooms and a common living room area with free snacks (yogurt, cheese, fruit, and ice cream. There is a great little bar on site with a pool table and friendly staff, a great place to hang out after a day of meetings. The individual rooms were also very comfortable and functional with a very large desk area and free internet. Definitely a great place for business - would also be good for a romantic getaway.

Reviews.Title: “An awesome lodge tucked away near the airport”
Reviews.Author: JLittle13
Reviews.Content: Our experince started with the free airport shuttle and continued right throught the checkout. Awesome place!! Love the common lounge areas and the walking paths around the grounds. Great food and bar too.

Reviews.Title: “great place away from city”
Reviews.Author: addoll
Reviews.Content: we enjoyed our stay at cedarbrook lodge. the facility is very clean and the staff is friendly and helpful. it is near the airport so the plane noise is there but in the very comfortable room with the window closed all noise went away. love the public space living rooms that were complete with couches and snacks around the clock. we'll definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great unknown option! Beautiful setting where you'd least expect it!”
Reviews.Author: mindzipper
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a work meeting. I believe this place has been marketed as an executive type retreat location. However, it easily could be a stopover place between flights. The buildings are beautiful - wood lodge type settings. The rooms are modern and clean. Great workspace and lots of closet space/drawers. The workout room is fantastic. You don't even know you're near the airport - surrounded by trees and the trail to walk on. This place is great. Can see security cameras in the parking lots so feel secure. Room was nice - free wifi. Great bathroom products. Modern countertops (perhaps granite or recycled materials). SPACIOUS tub. In room coffee maker w/ real mugs and liquid creamer (not the powder junk). I think the bed is marketed as a queen, but I think it's a full...or just seems small. If you like lots of room - even if you travel as a couple - maybe get 2 beds for more space. The room will be larger as well. Roller shades that block out the light! yay! One of the best features if the "living rooms" on the main floor of each building. You can get complimentary bottled water, snacks (chips, malted milk balls, choc covered raisins, yogurt pretzels), a fridge w/ yogurt and string cheese - and the best part - a freezer full of the single serving haagen dazs ice cream cups! AWESOME! The food from the restaurant was wonderful - esp. for business buffet type places. No sad chicken breast covered w/ some salty sauce w/ potatos here...no, we're talking bbq ckn, salmon, mahi mahi, fresh salads, grains, whole wheat rolls...really good for meetings/conferences. NW ingredients (apples, fish, nuts, etc.) Overall - a great place for meetings or stopovers...no swimming pool, but assume that might be to keep kids away? Since it has a theme of business meetings there...quiet at night...

Reviews.Title: “Hidden gem”
Reviews.Author: Islandermike
Reviews.Content: Stayed overnight prior to early morning flight out of SeaTac. Very close to airport, great staff. Nice way to start a vacation, it would be a great place to stay longer.

Reviews.Title: “A little piece of heaven”
Reviews.Author: AmyQ116
Reviews.Content: We were fortunate enough to stumble upon this place with a Hotwire purchase, this is hands down the best value hotel we've ever stayed in. You immediately feel like you're at a luxurious spa with both the rooms, the grounds and the restaurant. Robes in the rooms, a big giant bathtub, beautiful picture windows and even complimentary snacks nearby! If we're back in the Seattle area, forget Hotwire, we're staying here. It's a quick 15 mile drive to downtown, easy access.

Reviews.Title: “Best hidden value at SeaTac”
Reviews.Author: sarasota-traveler
Reviews.Content: Great value and great staff. Best of choice at SeaTac.................

Reviews.Title: “Love, love, LOVE this place!!!!”
Reviews.Author: DivingGurl
Reviews.Content: After hours and hours of travel and a week spent with family....this was the last night of our vacation. We needed a hotel close to the airport and our brother-in-law suggested this place. OMG....I did NOT want to leave. It was gorgeous.....and VERY close to the airport. Everything about it was perfect....from black out shades, to robes, to the perfect bed & pillows, to hip & modern decor, to an incredibly appointed bathroom, to Starbucks coffee, etc! Seriously.....I am a world traveler and this is an incredible price for what is offered. The complimentary breakfast went above and beyond. Just a very cool place....I want to come back to Seattle just to stay here, and my husband and daughter agree!

Reviews.Title: “Refreshing Stay”
Reviews.Author: CDWilde
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Cedar Brooke Lodge in Seattle with our 7 month old daughter. It was relaxing. Our room was modern and well kept. It was clean, which is a big deal to us. They offered complimentary snacks (potato chips, malt balls, yogurt, ice cream and bottles of water) in each of the buildings. The front desk staff was terrific. I felt the evening staff in particular went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. As we were walking the grounds one gentlemen stopped us and asked how we were doing. He gave our little daughter a rubber duck. I would recommend this hotel to anyone. If you have small kids that like to run it really isn't the place and the breakfast might not work for kids. Smoked salmon and meats with pastries were great but not for kids.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing quality and value”
Reviews.Author: AnneMarie062
Reviews.Content: This airport location seems more like a destination resort. Its extensive grounds are beautiful, and the rooms are spacious and well-decorated. The food was excellent and reasonably priced, and the free breakfast buffet was high-quality and with a wide selection. Free ice cream and other snacks was an unexpected treat. The price was about one-half of what one would expect for accommodations of this quality. Don't pass this one up.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Beautiful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ogg023
Reviews.Content: I stop in Seattle for one night on my way to Hawaii I booked this hotel with hot wire..Great website..I got a great price for this luxrious and it was 10 minutes from the airport..PERFECT. They pick me up in a nice Red car .They treat me like a VIP went to my room beautiful with a great view of the park surrounded this hotel ,,The bathroom had a big soak bath with bath salt and they have bathrobes..Each floor has a living room with free snacks, fruits ,cheese, water bottles , tea and coffee.. They had book shelves fill with great booksI did order room serive for dnner the food was good and delivery in a short time. In the morning they have continental breakfast, boiled eggs ,cold cuts ,fruits, juice, pastries, salmon, crossants .teas and coffee and more... I had a great evening and night , They drove me to the airport the next morning I was rested and ready to go to my flt to Paradise,

Reviews.Title: “BEST BANG FORTHE BUCK”
Reviews.Author: sunrich
Reviews.Content: saved $$$$$$ on the location vs downtown. free shuttle to light rail and a quick 20 min (safe ride) to South lake center, hotel has free parking, breakfast,and a great staff ...24hour snacks available at each complex..... great value for families !

Reviews.Title: “Very impressed”
Reviews.Author: mpsd
Reviews.Content: An overall excellent experience. I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Get-Away”
Reviews.Author: Dave914
Reviews.Content: If I was searching for a place where I could relax, be surprised and enjoy without the risk...this would be it. My only caution is not to eat too much and beds are semi firm it that matters to you. Great staff...shuttle to light rail and area. Rent a car only if you need to!

Reviews.Title: “Terrific”
Reviews.Author: bkerswill
Reviews.Content: Loved my room, loved the grounds, loved the extras such as the free chips, yogurt, fruit, water and chocolate!! Also, the free continental breakfast was quite tastey. Great coffee and juice. And, best of all, the rooms have windows that actually open! Bathrooms are great too! I would absolutely recommend the Cedarbrook Lodge to friends and business colleagues.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel with perfect surroundings!”
Reviews.Author: WineFanPNW
Reviews.Content: My husband and I recently stayed for two days at the Cedarbrook Lodge in Seatac/Tukwilla area; a Fri/Sat combo. We looked at this particular hotel initially because they were associated with the Rock-n-Roll marathon but we picked them for many other reasons. First, the pictures and the website are dead on. The place was beautiful! We stayed in a double queen bed room and it was huge. The set up of the room was perfect, with a long desk along the front wall. There were two closets, and built in cabinet where the TV was kept. Right next to the oversize windows, they had a lounge chair and table. The bathroom was large and very clean. I believe there are three different "lodges" and each building has an individual "family room" type area. While the individual rooms don't have refrigerators (which is something I normally need to have); you are encouraged to use the large one in this family room. And there are FREE snacks~~~ three different types of malt balls, string cheese, yogurt, and Hagen Diaz ice cream. I admit that we definitely helped ourselves to these on a daily basis. Our booking deal came with a credit to the restaurant, Copper Leaf. We liked the seasonal menu and came back both nights. I recently finished culinary school and was really impressed with the food we received. I especially liked the presentation of their butter with the sea salt sprinkled down the middle. I had the most tender and light gnocchi/ fava bean dish ever. Initially the price can seem steep but everything we had seemed to be very worth the price, except maybe the soup, which was tasty but nothing overly special. We ate outside both nights and really enjoyed the setting. Another bonus was that we could just add the bill to the room charges, no questions asked. Nice and convenient. We walked the grounds and found what looked like very well tended herb gardens. We also took a walk through the greenbelt that circles the property. Everything was quiet and peaceful. I was really surprised at how close we were to the airport but how little of the noise we heard. And I liked that we could see the planes take off from our room, like they were in our backyard! And let me not forget the staff! From the minute I called to ask questions about the hotel to the minute we left, we were impressed. Everyone was not only nice but KNOWLEDGEABLE! It was such a nice change to have a staff that seriously knew what was going on and could answer questions correctly. Helpful and courteous every step of the way. Thank you!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Everything you could ask for and more!”
Reviews.Author: ac4l
Reviews.Content: As stated before, property is truly a hidden gem. Caring wonderful staff, spotless rooms, and a great heavy continental breakfast. Plus free airport shuttle, water, and treats to boot! Property is very environmentally friendly; specialized packaging, soap with missing center, and other nice touches show how important it is for this lodge to reduce it's impact to landfills.

Reviews.Title: “Best Kept Secret in the Seattle/Tacoma area”
Reviews.Author: Maureen_in_Oly
Reviews.Content: Cedarbrook is one of those best kept secrets in the SeaTac area. Formerly the conference center for WAMU, it is now owned by the Wright family - the folks who own the Space Needle. Only a mile or so from SeaTac airport, Cedarbrook offers a tranquil, upscale enviornment - you would never suspect you are near an airport. The sleeping rooms are large and comfortable. The conference space is very professional and comes in a variety of options for space - from an auditorium to small "dens". The food is fantastic and there is lots of it. The new bistro resturant is in front of the fireplace and is a nice intimate place for dinner and features fresh northwest foods. Breakfast and Lunch are served in their larger space and includes well stocked buffets. Living rooms in the sleeping room area feature a kitchette with a fridge stocked with water, yogurt, string cheese, etc. and a freezer full of individual sized hagen-das. Probably the best thing about the place, though, is the staff, which are welcoming, professional and wonderful to work with. There is also a small bar and a nice fitness room. Obviously, I can't say enough nice things about this place. We use them often for our trainings, but it is also a nice place to stay for someone visiting the area for fun.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: Runner91
Reviews.Content: We were very surprised at the understated elegance. The room was very comfortable. We loved the full-sized bathroom and soaking tub. We did not hear the planes even though we were right at the airport. The grounds are beautiful. We would love to stay at the lodge again.

Reviews.Title: “I wish there is a Cedarbrook Lodge in every city I travel to!”
Reviews.Author: JYYL
Reviews.Content: The lodge is everything its website says it is and better!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to relax”
Reviews.Author: Joellens
Reviews.Content: Found this place in a tourist brochure, checked it out here and booked a room for an impromptu weekend in Seattle. Got a good deal with our AAA discount and completely enjoyed our stay. This is the former WAMU leadership/conference center and some signs have not yet been changed. It is incredibly quiet! The gardens and water features all around are very relaxing and soothing, nice fitness room and the convenient snack bar in the living room of each building was very convenient for grabbing water before we went out on the town. The only thing we missed was a swimming pool or spa but that was not really missed too much. Reasonable price and great accommodations, where we were not nickel and dimed for every amenity, Free parking, wifi, water and snacks. We saved 50 a day on those things alone. Great find, we'll be returning when we need to be staying in Seattle.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful location, fantastic food, and fun amenities”
Reviews.Author: browyncats
Reviews.Content: The Cedarbrook Lodge is well-appointed, comfortable, in a beautiful setting. The food was excellent, with lots of unusual dishes, healthy salads, good desserts, nice wine selections. I loved the snacks available throughout--monster malted milkballs (including mint), yogurt, fruit, and water in refrigerators near the rooms, and Haagen-Dasz ice cream cups for that midnight snack. I stayed as part of a business group but would not hesitate to go back as a guest not on a business trip.

Reviews.Title: “A very comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: GilliganGirl
Reviews.Content: We had an early flight out and wanted a place to stay near SEATAC. We were pleasantly surprised to find the Cedarbrook Lodge - it's a great little hideaway. The hotel ground has so much ambiance - we felt safe and had a good's night rest. It's just as they advertise on their website - clean, well-maintained, and friendly staff. I'd stay here again if I'm ever back in the Seattle area.

Reviews.Title: “This place is a great find.”
Reviews.Author: Lucyck
Reviews.Content: Although this hotel is close to SeaTac Airport , it doesn't feel like an airport hotel. The grounds are pleasant and it is very quiet. The restaurant staff was very pleasant and helpful. We only stayed one night but we would certainly try this hotel again and would recommend to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Different, but very positive experience”
Reviews.Author: rwright42
Reviews.Content: Looking for a change from the typical Hilton/airport overnight stay, I stumbled upon Cedarbrook Lodge while researching on the Internet. We were headed to Washington, D.C. from BC, and decided to stay overnight in Seattle at each end of the trip to reduce the jet-lag. Lodge is an appropriate term for this place, as it is not your typical hotel. Although within about 5 minutes of the airport, the setting amongst trees, creeks, etc., make you feel as though you are away from it all! The rooms were nice - clean, pleasant, with excellent free Wifi. The TVs were a bit old, and placed off to the end of the room (probably because this used to be the WaMu leadership center), but we didn't use them. A neat feature is that each building has a living room, with seating, TV, free snacks and water - everyone seemed pleased with this. Our first room's A/C wasn't working, but they moved us to another room. On our return trip, the shower drained slowly, so there were a couple maintenance issues, but no big deals. Staff was friendly and helpful, but the check-in process was quite slow and disorganized both times. The second time, they didn't have the room type we reserved, but they gave us two smaller rooms instead, which was fine. Accessibility could be an issue for some, as you may have to walk quite a bit to get to your building/room (it is a lodge, after all). Nice business center, to use computers and print out boarding passes. Overall, we quite liked the place as a stop-over for long trips through Seattle.

Reviews.Title: “I want to go back!!”
Reviews.Author: Lcrich56
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the night before we had to fly home after traveling to Vancouver for a wedding. What a great way to end the trip. This hotel really knows customer service. They upgraded us to a corner suite for our anniversary. Beautiful grounds. We had a light dinner in the almost empty restaurant and it was good. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Wow, I am thoroughly impressed!!!”
Reviews.Author: EarthSpinner
Reviews.Content: Wow, wow. I found this hotel through Tripadvisor and read the reviews before the arrival. I wasn't sure what hotels deserved 5 stars. This one does. It's not a luxury hotel but it's an amazing value. This used to be some sort of retreat/meeting center for now bankrupt WAMU and it's now a part of independently owned boutique lodging. My room had two queen beds on the ground floor. All of the buildings were 3-story tall and lots of greenery to make you feel like you're in a forest somewhere even though you're only 5 minutes away from the airport. The interior of the room is very business-like, probably owing to its original mission. Downtown Seattle is maybe 15 mins drive. If you don't have to stay in downtown, this is the place to stay. I also stayed in the Westin Seattle during the same trip. Only reason I would stay in Westin over this is that I appreciated the walking distance to the waterfront and Pike Market. But you have to pay the exorbitant parking and Westin is more expensive. In addition, at Cedarbrook, you receive free WiFi, bottle water, ice cream, breakfast, etc. It's simple "Amazing"! Pros: Clean Shower/Bathroom, lots of desk space, free WiFI, free Haagen-Dazs cupsize ice cream and bottle water, free (and good) continental breakfast, free parking, nice greenery on the property Cons: None

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional”
Reviews.Author: mamadeer
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT place to stay! Whether you're here for business or pleasure you will not be disappointed with your stay!!! I was thrilled to have chosen the Cedarbrook Lodge for my visit to the Seattle area! This place is a Gem! Excellent! Excellent! Excellent!

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel I've been to and I used many.”
Reviews.Author: Nita1970
Reviews.Content: The hotel is peaceful with water noises all around. The breakfast is nice, the landscape is well done. The even have a snack area available 24hrs a day. Will definitely go back. Thanks Cedarbrook for the effort.

Reviews.Title: “Wot a delight”
Reviews.Author: krttering
Reviews.Content: We stop hear strait from the airport after a 9 1/2 hour flight from London, And wot a delight all the staff could not have been nicer. I would not hesitate to stay here again if we come back to Seattle.

Reviews.Title: “Just loved this lodge!!”
Reviews.Author: HeribertoHernandezJr
Reviews.Content: At first I was concerned that the distance from Downtown Seattle would be a negative point, but that was soon dismissed. The staff was incredibly helpful and cordial, the complimentary snacks in the kitchen were a big plus, the complimentary on-site parking beat out the $30/nightly or so that downtown hotels were charging, and the complimentary shuttle made getting around locally a breeze. I could go on and on, but let's just say that my girlfriend and I would not hesitate to stay here again on our next Seattle visit.

Reviews.Title: “Spectacular”
Reviews.Author: grooveo
Reviews.Content: I just can't say enough about Cedarbrook. From the moment I was picked up by the shuttle, to the moment I was dropped off, the staff just could not have been any nicer. The room was spotless and the grounds were beautiful. I would stay here again in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: “Eco and Elegant”
Reviews.Author: RSSJMom
Reviews.Content: The Cedarbrook Lodge is an exhilarating discovery. Access to SeaTac Airport was equally as convenient as other hotels/motels in SeaTac yet the experience of Cedarbrook Lodge gave us a sense of respite far from the city; a quiet environmentally attentive welcome. The atmosphere is tranquil, graceful and refreshing; yet the locality allows access to all of the energy of the city attractions if a guest would so choose. The amenities added to a high caliber of elegance; small living rooms were set aside with overstuffed leather classiness; many of the fineries were of exquisite slates and natural wood or irons. The grounds were large and the walkways were worth an evening stroll. There were ponds and waterfalls within and without. The workout room was useful with two recumbent bikes, two stair-step machines, free weights, four treadmills, and weight machines, not to mention water and towels and showers with all of the same provisions as your own room. The morning breakfast was sumptuous and the readily available day/evening snacks were healthy and pleasing.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, wonderful amenities”
Reviews.Author: luv2travel19802010
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Cedarbrook Lodge and found it to be a great value. The location was excellent, so close to the airport yet none of the airport noise. This eco-friendly hotel was so relaxing with the tall trees and flowing streams. The staff was very knowlegable. We used the complimentary shuttle to take us to the light rail station then on to Pike Market. We definitely recommend this and would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Markpdx
Reviews.Content: Wow what a great experience!! Tucked away close to the Seatac airport and just off the interstate. Easy to find. Quiet. Great service. Beautiful grounds. This hotel is a true find.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Jotade
Reviews.Content: Although my trip was for bussiness, I really enjoy the staying in CedarBrook. The customer Service is excellent and the food delicious, beautiful place to stay and very convinient near the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden jewel in the Emerald City!”
Reviews.Author: KateA_10
Reviews.Content: Happened upon this hotel while doing a last minute search online, and got a great rate on hotels.com. My husband and I were traveling with our 3 year old daughter and this place was great for her and us. The staff is very friendly, the food is amazing, the grounds are immaculate, the rooms are big and the decor is best described as modern chic. The included continental breakfast is truly continental with a Northwestern accent, not your typical disappointing American "Continental breakfast". We loved this place and will return.

Reviews.Title: “Incredibly charming and extremely beautiful!”
Reviews.Author: Celine W
Reviews.Content: I imagined it was going to be beautiful just by looking at pictures. I even did a quick drive through before I actually checked in but once I actually walked through the door, I realized that pictures did not even do the Cedarbrook lodge any justice. They also have living rooms in each off the buildings and they are fully stocked with chips, cookies, ice cream and water bottles. The rooms are fairly spacious and have a very clean and fresh scent. The bed was extremely comfortable and the sheets were some of the softest I've ever laid in. The bathroom was AMAZING with a huge soaking tub. My boyfriend and I are in a long distance relationship so staying in beautiful hotels for our weekend getaways is a thing that we have embedded into our relationship. I wanted our stay here in Seattle to be perfect and the Cedarbrook lodge is honestly one of the absolute best hotels we've ever stayed in during the past year and a half of our getaways.

Reviews.Title: “O...M...G...definitely a hidden treasure!”
Reviews.Author: kimg46
Reviews.Content: This hotel was awesome! Compared to the more well-known chains, this was much, much nicer! All the staff were friendly and helpful, the location/grounds are beautiful, and you'd never know you're literally 5 minutes from the airport! (I didn't believe that when I read it!) Great fitness room, the living rooms in each of the buildings are great, stocked with snacks and water for grabbing after a long day of sight-seeing. Would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Delightful!”
Reviews.Author: Eileenmichel
Reviews.Content: So close to the airport, yet so tucked away in beautiful nature setting. Rooms are spacious and elegant. Very eco-friendly. Staff is friendly and helpful. Great value. Wish we could have stayed longer!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful facility, very clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Chuck80
Reviews.Content: we were only there one night, between flight and cruise day, wish we had longer to enjoy the comfort and style!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best place I've ever stayed--absolutely wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: Meredith01
Reviews.Content: Cedarbrook has beautiful grounds, a business center, gym, snacks in the lobby area for free (bottled water, string cheese, yogurt, haagen daz individual ice cream snacks, chocolate malt balls, etc), an amazing continental breakfast (that is much more than continental) and excellent customer service. We loved every minute of our stay. We wish we could live there! :)

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful secret hideaway”
Reviews.Author: nwdad
Reviews.Content: My wife and I found this unexpected oasis and will definitely return. The grounds are beautiful and you do not feel like you are near a big city. It is quiet and peaceful. The amenities are great - little things like free fruit and treats in each building and honestly the best free hotel breakfast I've ever had.

Reviews.Title: “The Best!”
Reviews.Author: kslbel
Reviews.Content: Cedarbrook is absoulutely the finest place to stay for business or pleasure. I have stayed there 9 days in the past year, and have never found anything to be less than excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Not your average hotel - well worth the stay”
Reviews.Author: niagarajo
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night as it was close to the airport for an early morning flight. I searched online comparing other airport hotels and rates. Cedarbrook Lodge topped them all and now having stayed here we knew we made the right choice. We will definately return for a longer stay. Our room with two queen beds was quite roomy and the decor hip and modern. Cedarbrook Lodge offers awesome amenities including complimentary ice cream, yogurt, bottled water and more in a tranquil setting, you almost feel you are at home. Parking is free and the staff very accommodating. We took advantage of the Lodge's free shuttle service to the airport and hopped on the Link Light Rail ($5.00 each for a round trip fare) for a half hour trip to downtown Seattle for dinner. Way cheaper than a taxi fare and a more enjoyable ride.

Reviews.Title: “WOW Beautiful Lodge”
Reviews.Author: Babydoll2000
Reviews.Content: Close to the lite rail to get downtown, they drive you there and airport also. The whole lodge is very beautiful, better than we expected, Classy Frank Lollyd wright design with modern japanese touches. Great selection of items for breakfast in a beautiful setting with high soaring ceilings and fireplaces. They have a 'living room' that is public 24/7 for free snacks like hagen daz ice cream, chocolates, drinks. A real treat when we came in late! Very cozy elegant atmosphere. My husband and I will always remember it.

Reviews.Title: “Cedarbrook Lodge is Seatac's Best Kept Secret”
Reviews.Author: Robbi10
Reviews.Content: Cedarbrook Lodge is a lovely property located near the airport that looks and feels like you are miles away. The Copperleaf Restaurant is exceptional, the rooms are subtly appointed but with all the technology you need. The "living rooms" provide complimentary snacks 24 hrs a day; malt balls and Haagen Dazs! Complimentary breakfast is not your typical continental fare, which is good! Staff is extremely friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Cedarbrook is a beautiful place and excellent quality.”
Reviews.Author: Maestromark
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Cedarbrook for a wedding - the reception was at Cedarbrook. The place is beautiful, the rooms very comfortable. Completely relaxing experience. They have large common rooms if you want to hang out outside your room - and int hem they have little snack food and bottles of water for the taking. A nice little perk. Cedarbrook is near SeaTac airport, but you don't hear plane noise - it is green and quiet. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “luxury hotel”
Reviews.Author: lugareslejanos
Reviews.Content: This hotel is like an oasis in the dessert. It was less than 5 minutes from SEA-TAC airport and provided complementary shuttle service. Once you enter the hotel area you feel like you're in another place. The hotel has a feel of being in a cabin in the woods/mountains. The staff are super friendly and helpful. The even remember my name! The room was clean with a great view. Bed was very confortable and clean. You can't hear the airport noise. It didn't have that typical hotel smell that stays in your clothes after you leave. The bath tub are big and great for soaking and relaxing and can't say less about their complementary bath products. There was starbucks coffe and Tazo tea in the room for free. Each building had a living/seating area with a fireplace and free snacks (water, ice cream, chips, candy, chocolates, fruit, and yogurt). Breakfast was included and it was not just coffee and a bagel. There's a small bar with a pool table and restaurant, a business center, and a fitness center. In conclussion, this hotel is excellent and hopefully everything will remain that way. I stay only one night but it felt like a mini vacation.

Reviews.Title: “An incredible layover!”
Reviews.Author: flybyefl
Reviews.Content: Minutes from Sea-Tac but so far removed in atmosphere, this amazing lodge delivers impeccable service, accomodations, and amenities. Seemingly, every need is anticipated and provided for and every staff member has genuine concern for your comfort. A truly relaxing experience as a base for exploring the area, as a stop over when cruising or traveling West, or for business.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Wolfman1953
Reviews.Content: Staff was excellent and friendly. They asked to do everything for you. The included snacks were great and well appreciated on a late check-in, wi-fi and continental breakfast was a bit above average. The rooms were clean, seemed new and comfortable. Our travel companion posted "OMG, this place is awesome." One of the best places we've stayed.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place to Stay!!”
Reviews.Author: agent_330
Reviews.Content: This was a fantastic place to stay!! I would highly recommend Cedarbrook Lodge to anyone who wants a great nights sleep in a beautiful location. We have stayed in a lot of motels and Cedarbrook by far had the most comfortable bed. Slept great. Near the airport and we did not notice any noise from the airport. Beautiful Grounds with water falls and ponds. Hard to believe that it is so close to everything.

Reviews.Title: “Beyond exsptations.”
Reviews.Author: tahtah537
Reviews.Content: Lodge was very nice, close to airport but located in way that made you feel you were secluded from the rest of the city. Well maintaned, friendly stafff. Cofortable bed.

Reviews.Title: “our last night of vacation”
Reviews.Author: maumeeastoria
Reviews.Content: We loved ending our vacation with such a comfortable stay. We enjoyed the outside spaces and walking trails at Cedarbrook Lodge. We also enjoyed being able to open our windows to the outside air and hearing the birds singing in the morning. It was amazing that we didn't hear airport noise at all - it was great.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Start to Our Vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Blink810
Reviews.Content: We live quite a distance from the airport, and staying at Cedarbrook Lodge was less expensive than flying the commuter or taking a shuttle service. We'd been referred by my boss, and were not disappointed. It's hard to believe the airport is so close by; it's an oasis of calm. The service was first rate, the continental breakfast delicious and varied (not your typical fare), the room spacious and the beds comfortable. It's like a resort near the airport. Our only complaint was that it was nicer than the hotel we stayed in while on vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Loved this place!”
Reviews.Author: gyocke
Reviews.Content: Unique, quiet and beautiful setting. Employees were kind and friendly and the gym was terrific. I stayed here by myself and next time I want to bring my husband here so he can understand why I'm raving about the place. I envision us just staying on the grounds the whole time and relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “OMG - I wish every hotel was like Cedarbrook”
Reviews.Author: outergrommet
Reviews.Content: In brief, the Cedarbrook Lodge was the best hotel experience I've EVER had other than resort/spa types. The aesthetics of the grounds, the buildings and the accommodations are all lovely and relaxing. There were almost zero signs of the SEA-TAC airport a mile away. The rooms were well appointed and very, very quiet. The extra touches like water & candy in the community lounges were appreciated and I am still dreaming of the amazing lunch we had a the restaurant. Amazing. The best of all was the service. Every person we met and every request we made was a positive experience. They even prepared a fantastic box breakfast for me on my departure day since I was leaving before the continental breakfast. Kudos to Cedarbrook and I hope more facilities take their lead.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Stay at the Cedarbrook”
Reviews.Author: sruitto
Reviews.Content: Flew into SEA last Saturday night to meet my daughter and her infant son and assist them back to PHL Sunday morning. Needed a clean place to stay since the baby is only a few weeks old. Was met at the Cedarbrook with open arms. Hotel was very clean and pleasant. Room service was quick and the free snacks are a real treat. Departed too early for the free breakfast. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is an absolute must”
Reviews.Author: gmunkie
Reviews.Content: Like the rest of the reviews posted, I have to echo the positives. Serene environment; can't hear the planes when inside the rooms. Complimentary bottled water, snacks, ice cream, and continental breakfast were all bonuses; quality was excellent. Property in & out was exceptionally clean & well cared for. Complimentary business center meant I did not have to bring a laptop. This was my first stay, and I will now always stay at this property. Great value.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel had lots of little things that made it special.”
Reviews.Author: RockMontana
Reviews.Content: This hotel had great service, very comfortable beds, large tub and shower, and very friendly staff. One of the best parts of it is the free snacks and water in the living room area. We could also use that refrigerator to put things in. Everything about Cedarbrook Lodge is first class.

Reviews.Title: “WOW. WOW. WOW. What a perfect room, restaurant, staff, and environmentallysensitive company!"”
Reviews.Author: NiseFlorida
Reviews.Content: You find this hotel to be a rare blend of luxury and coziness and eco- friendliness. The airport is minutes away and the shuttle will pick you up for free, the landscaping and architecture is divine and zen- like. The meals are fresh and natural. The rooms are decorated as if "Dwell Magazine" had assisted. The bath products are all natural. The common area is like a living room- fireplace, lounge areas, and a fully stocked fridge and snack area with complementary drinks, yogurt, ice-cream, chocolate, and healthy chips. I would recommend Coastal Hotels/Cedarbrook Lodge to anyone for business or fun.

Reviews.Title: “I love Cedarbrook Lodge!”
Reviews.Author: Love2Travel543
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Cedarbrook lodge for 3 nights for work. I loved everything about it. The rooms were very clean, very comfortable bed, nice bathrooms, and every meal was great! (breakfast, lunch, & dinner!) The best part was the atmosphere. There were beautiful trees and pond features on the property. I loved the outside fireplace and all the indoor fireplaces. Very warm and cozy. The fitness center was great too! The "living rooms" were great, it was nice to sit by the fireplace and have some free icecream and malt balls. Also the customer service at the bars, dinner rooms, and front desk were wonderful. The best was a bartender named Pete. Very friendly and fun to talk to. I hope work sends me here again, it was a great stay! If you are needing to be near the Seattle airport, this is the best place. I'm not sure if I'd stay here if I was wanting to spend my time in Seattle due to commute. Regardless, I loved this place!!

Reviews.Title: “You will love this lodge!”
Reviews.Author: johnc88
Reviews.Content: The lodge is close to the airport, but you won't know it. It is quiet, beautiful inside and out. clean and comfortable. We are going back for another night at the end of our vacation and we can't wait to get back. The staff is attentive and very pleasant. Go as soon as you can, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: “A gem in the city”
Reviews.Author: Mexicodreaming1
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful property. Close to the airport but the feeling is that you are at a remote location. The service is wonderful. Comfortable beds and the snacks are a great touch. The morning breakfast is a delight.

Reviews.Title: “what a great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: larryhagan
Reviews.Content: wished I could have stayed longer. Great bath tub!

Reviews.Title: “Seattle's Best Kept Secret”
Reviews.Author: MsW-L
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I spent the weekend at the Cedarbrook Lodge. We wish we could have stayed longer. The entire staff was friendly and helpful. It was a retreat setting blocks from the airport. Quiet ponds with mallards floating peacefully, waterfalls, flowering cherry trees, magnolias in full bloom. Plenty of storage and workspace in the room. Great breakfast. Free snacks. Free parking.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden gem near the airport”
Reviews.Author: CherO50
Reviews.Content: Although the Lodge is near the airport you feel as if you are far away in a wooded sanctuary. Very calm and peaceful ambiance with beautiful grounds and gardens, and cozy fireplaces in common areas create a comfortable, relaxing feel. The lounge area is the perfect spot for a late evening glass of wine on the sofa by the large fireplace. The complimentary breakfast was fabulous as well as the treats in common areas of Haagen Daz, yogurt, string cheese, fruit and jars of malt balls and yogurt pretzels. We will definitely be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Resort-like hotel very near SeaTac Airport”
Reviews.Author: Maplewest
Reviews.Content: Well maintained property with a "resort-like" feel in an urban forested area. A hotel that does not look like a hotel when you arrive. Rooms have a "designer" interior and furnishings, very comfortable and very clean. Near Sea-Tac airport but did not notice any sound from aircraft. Convenient shuttle to and from nearby light-rail transit station made for an easy trip to downtown Seattle. Free snacks and breakfast include some unique but very wholesome items. The breakfast area is situated in a beautiful "lodge" building with cedar decor. Staff are very friendly and accommodating. Hotel is easily accessible from I-5 (without hearing traffic noise) and quality shopping malls are nearby. The lack of a pool and hot tub is more than compensated by the overall quality of this place. We spent four nights at the facility and highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hidden gem, loved it and give it my strongest recommmendation”
Reviews.Author: HSWVancouver
Reviews.Content: WE recently stayed at Cedarbrook lodge/ We found it on trip advisor while looking for a hotel near Seatac, before an early morning flight out. Well let me say all the glowing reviews are spot on. This is a beautiful place 5-10 minutes from seatac, but you do not hear the planes. IT is like a hidden oasis in the city, although only a block or so off international blvd, there is no traffic or noise and you would never know that the " city was near by" . Hotel is beautiful, all wood and glass , and includes complimentary parking and complimentary breakfast buffet. ( no waffles/pancakes nor some of the other cheap stuff that one finds at some places, so if you are looking for that you will not find it here, ) but a very nice selection of the basics, nicely presented and served in a beautiful venue. A lovely and more than adequate breakfast in our opinion. The rooms are on the small side, but lovely, with nice linens, and all is modern. Each sleeping building has a common large living room area with complimentary snacks for guests, hagen daz , yogurt ,string cheese, bottled water, chocolate malt balls , and other candy, fruit etc, as well as magazines and books to browse. How great is that! complimentary internet in main building, walking paths on the grounds , and fitness center and pool table. They also have an onsite restaurant, we didnt try it but it looked very nice. Staff is EXTREMELY friendly , welcoming, and accomodating, ! - We stayed a second time for two nights on our way back through seattle and it was again a fabulous experience. WE were very impressed and would highly recommend the cedarbrook lodge. and will stay here again anytime we travel though this area.

Reviews.Title: “Totally exceeded our Expectations!”
Reviews.Author: dhawkes
Reviews.Content: We just needed a place to sleep before catching an early morning flight but the Cedarbrook Lodge had us so impressed we wished we could stay longer! Ultra friendly service, beautiful grounds and super comfortable rooms just made the night fantastic. Icing on the cake was complimentary snacks/drinks in the common room! Who doesn't like Haagen Dazs ice cream? We will definitley be back.

Reviews.Title: “Free Ice Cream, 'Nuff Said.”
Reviews.Author: orion938
Reviews.Content: I booked a room at Cedarbrook because I was wrapping up a trip around the Northwest and wanted a hotel for the night that was close to the airport for my early morning flight. I originally intended to stay at one of the regular chain hotels but I noticed on hotels.com that Cedarbrook had a 100% guest recommendation rating out of nearly 300 reviews. So, I went for it. When I checked in, I felt like I was stepping into a cozy yet refined mountain lodge. The gentleman at the desk was extremely gracious and, to my delight, informed me there was complimentary ice cream, bottled water, yogurt, fresh fruit, and other snacks in the lounge near my room (which also featured a lit fireplace, books, and comfy chairs). And the room itself? Very comfortable and modern (but still cozy) with tons of storage space. If you like free Hagaan Dazs, friendly service, and a cozy room, stay at Cedarbrook!

Reviews.Title: “An oasis of calm and service in the heart of the airport area.”
Reviews.Author: Wiimaster
Reviews.Content: Stellar service, comfortable, casual and modern atmosphere with high quality bedding and quiet peaceful surroundings make for a great visit business or pleasure. Convenient location just off the highway and very close to the airport but no noise. Fantastic food in the restaurant for dinner much of it local and organic, and very reasonably priced, especially the wine. Breakfast was also excellent if even a bit small. Ample parking, pretty grounds and genuinely friendly and helpful staff across the board. Have not had this level of service since a 4 seasons and at a fraction of the price. Strongest recommendation and will stay there again anytime in the Seattle area if you don't need to be downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Probably the best hotel experience I have ever had.”
Reviews.Author: Wannabeparrothead
Reviews.Content: Very impressed by this establishment. Close to the Sea-Tac airport, yet it felt like you were out of town. Front desk was very friendly. Each building has its own area with a fireplace, bottled water and ice cream (big hit with the 12 year old). Our double bed room had a large desk (WIFI in room), two closets and a large bathroom. This is one of those places you almost hope others dont find out about. Excellent place to put up out of town business associates. Also, I am not affiliated with the hotel, this is just a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Best Kept Secret at Sea-TAc”
Reviews.Author: marciajo
Reviews.Content: For travelers spending the night at Sea-Tac prior to an early morning flight, this is simply the best. Everything is beautiful - the rooms, the staff, the food, the grounds. From your northwest lodge, you are within viewing distance of the airport, yet set in acres of wetlands and nature. Nothing is smokey, tacky, or mildewy. The staff is happy. engaging and helpful. I cannot say enough about Cedarbrook, and I hope that enough people will support it so that it may thrive into the future.. -Marcia Spees, Eastsound, WA; Dec. 20,2009

Reviews.Title: “Incredibly comfortable and charming with world's best service”
Reviews.Author: Art_travel50
Reviews.Content: I will start with a "caveat" that I arrived quite bedraggled after a difficult day of travel, and was upset, when checking in, to learn that I had to get back in the car and drive to some parking lot somewhere in the pouring rain. (This is due to the fact that the hotel is made up of separate lodges). I was so exhausted and unable to take one more frustration that I had a "meltdown" at the desk and this is where I first learned how fabulous this hotel's service is: they insisted on accompanying me out to the parking lot, and staying with me until I got settled into the room. They could not have been more solicitous even though I was beyond "cranky." Although the restaurant was closed, they were able to rustle up a fantastic dinner in a beautiful room with a fireplace, and next morning the excellent service continued in the form of a most wonderful breakfast buffet. I've only been commenting on the service here, so let me also point out the comfort and beautiful furnishings of the room. Also, each of the lodges that makes up the hotel has a lovely sitting room with snacks, books, etc. It could not have been more comfortable and charming. Every aspect of the place deserves a "5+."

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: travels49
Reviews.Content: Tranquil surroundings. Great rooms for reading and lounging. Great snacks! Fitness center was wonderful, not at all like a typical hotel's fitness center. This is a great place to get away for a weekend of quiet and reflection.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful retreat”
Reviews.Author: madforsox
Reviews.Content: We found Cedarbrook as we were looking for a hotel near SeaTac airport in Seattle. Everything about this hotel was wonderful - accomodating and pleasant staff, beautiful rooms, fabulous snack area, great breakfast buffet. They provide transportation from the airport to the hotel, and also arranged a car for me to take to the train station downtown. I found this place to have the best hospitality we have ever found (we have one 10 yr old and a 13 yr old who also loved it). They had a well equipped exercise room. Unfortunately, no swimming pool, but we did fine without it. It was the closest to coming to staying at a retreat center, but being close to many venues.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: pistol1997
Reviews.Content: The Cedarbrook Conference Center was absolutely fantastic, the staff was extremely courteous, the room and food was excellent. What really impressed me was that the rooms had spa tubs, and complementary robes. The grounds where beautiful, and if it was warmer I would have gone outside to enjoy the surroundings. I would recommend this place to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel and surroungings”
Reviews.Author: MdTraveler88
Reviews.Content: We loved this hotel! The grounds are so pretty that they are used for weddings. You could tell that the property was well maintained. They provided a free shuttle from the SeaTac hotel and also volunteered to drive us to the monorail (about 10 min. away) so we could go to downtown Seattle. Also, the free buffet breakfast was outstanding. I hope we get the opportunity to visit again.

Reviews.Title: “A walk in the woods”
Reviews.Author: NaKoa
Reviews.Content: After a late flight and later check-in, we awoke to an amazing view of cedar trees outside our floor to ceiling windows. We felt like we were literally in the middle of a forest, although we were all of 5 minutes from SeaTac Airport. If you like peace and quiet, this is the place for you. Previous reviewers told me what to expect, but I was surprised by the simple beauty of the hotel. The property surrounds a open beamed central building that houses meeting rooms, a soaring two story fireplace in the lobby, a side room with a pool table and bar and an onsite restaurant. Covered walkways lead you a few steps to side buildings holding the guest rooms. All rooms face either the wetlands or an interior view of beautifully landscaped trees, bushes and the occasional squirrel. The rooms are modern, glass, wood and chrome themed. Clean and obviously well cared for. The rooms are so quiet you are barely aware of other guests. A central lounge in each of the buildings holds a fireplace, tv, small library and a refrigerator stocked with all the free bottled water, yogurt, ice cream and string cheese you can drag to your room. Apothecary jars on a counter also hold pretzels, malt balls, chips, etc. Nice. A huge exercise room had every apparatus known from treadmills to ellipticals to free weights and squat racks. One of the nicer properties we've been to.

HotelInfo.Name: Cedarbrook Lodge
HotelInfo.Address: 18525 36th Avenue South, Seattle, WA 98188-4967
